views.markdown:
## This package is currently broken due to changes in PojavLauncher since it was released. A fix update is coming soon.
### Raise the FPS!
PojavLauncher can be slow on older devices, anywhere from 1-8 FPS in a detailed and complicated world. Discord moderator Chuck_Norris_ released an optimization modpack for FabricMC that could circumvent this issue and provide even from the game.

With his help, I'm glad to announce that __PojavOptimize__, a PojavLauncher optimization pack is now available on my repository. 

### What mods?
Some of the mods included are purely aesthetic, while others serve a real purpose:

- __Sodium__, which is a massive overhaul of Minecraft's rendering to converse CPU cycles.
- __Starlight__, which rewrites Minecraft's lighting to provide a better experience witohut the overhead.
- __NotEnoughCrashes__, to generate more in-depth crash logs and allow you to continue playing even if the world crashes.
- __Lithium__, to improve game ticks.
- __OKZoomer__, to provide OptiFine-like zooming features.
- __Krypton__, to optimize the networking stack.
- __FerriteCore__, to reduce the memory usage.
- and many more (as seen on the [GitHub repo](https://github.com/Doregon/PojavOptimize)).

__This package requires that you have installed Fabric according to the version number!__
Fixed file system permissions when installing the package.
